member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.AlphaMaskEffect
member.summary: Changes the opacity of an image by applying an alpha mask from a second image.

remarks.p: This effect combines the alpha channel of its AlphaMask input image with the specified Source image. RGB values of the AlphaMask are ignored.
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Alpha mask effect.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.AlphaMaskEffect.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AlphaMaskEffect class.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.AlphaMaskEffect.Source
member.summary: Gets or sets the color input source.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.AlphaMaskEffect.AlphaMask
member.summary: Gets or sets the alpha mask input source.
